name: Notion library
description:
I made this collection because I got fed up of screenshotting Notion. I hope you find this as useful as I have! âœ¨


In this file I've included:

  • Colour styles for both light and dark mode
  • Text styles for key sans serif text
  • A template for cover images that works on most devices


Use this as a library or just copy/eyedropper the bits you need. If there's anything missing/broken please let me know! ðŸ’ª
